backend/main.mo: Actor providing admin-protected approval management and per-user profile storage using AccessControl and UserApproval modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping admin UI feature requirements to involved frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries of numerous frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme definitions with light/dark CSS variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the main React entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Entry React component choosing between login, admin panel, or user dashboard based on session state.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Confirm: Reusable confirmation dialog using AlertDialog components with customizable text and variants.
Wrapper around Sonner toast for consistent success, error, and info notifications.
Layout wrapper for admin UI with header, footer, branding, and logout confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Footer displaying company branding and a support button with gradient styling.
Outer dashboard frame applying borders, rounded layout, and viewport‑filling container.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Main admin dashboard component managing active sections, rendering navigation, summary cards, footer, and logout flow.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Bottom navigation bar for switching between admin views with icons and active-state styling.
Grid-based menu offering navigation shortcuts to major admin sections with styled icon buttons.
Layout wrapper providing a styled header, back button, and content container for admin subpages.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/a: Defines AdminView union type and navigation item metadata for admin routing.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Displays three circular summary cards showing total income, total expense, and due amounts using stored account data.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/App: Loads pending user requests and allows approving users, updating storage and worker/rate data.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Com: Form and tables for adding and viewing company financial reports, stored by type and sorted by timestamp.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Fin: Displays each worker’s total bill, cost, and remaining balance using stored account data.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Nas: Allows adding, listing, and deleting snack expenses split among selected workers while updating their account costs.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pay: Manages loan/payment entries for workers, storing history and updating each worker’s cost balance.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pro: Records production entries, calculates totals, updates worker bill balances, and supports deletion.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Set: Wrapper that renders the system settings component.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Sys: Provides UI for updating branding settings including company name, channel name, and logo.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Use: Displays user approval requests using the ApprovalsSection component.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Wor: Manages worker list and per‑worker single/double rate settings using local storage with add, edit, and delete actions.
Handles adding work entries based on worker rates, updates individual bill amounts, and manages history.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginView.tsx: Provides a styled login form with branding, handling authentication, validation, and toggling to registration.
Handles new user registration by validating input, checking duplicates in local storage, and adding pending requests.
frontend/src/features/support/SupportVie: Implements user/admin support messaging, showing threads, viewing messages, and sending new messages via local storage.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Us: Displays KPI summary cards for total due, total work, and total cost for a user.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Payme: Loads and displays a user's payment and nasta history from local storage, filtering by username and calculating totals.
frontend/src/features/user/production/Pr: Retrieves and shows production work records for the logged‑in user, including totals for body count and earnings.
frontend/src/features/user/production/wo: Formats worker names from an entry, falling back to 'Unknown worker' when needed.
frontend/src/features/user/profile/Profi: Provides UI for updating profile photo, mobile number, and password, using session updates and local storage.
frontend/src/features/user/UserDashboard: Renders the user dashboard with navigation to history, profile, support views, calculates KPIs, and handles logout.
frontend/src/features/user/work/WorkHist: Displays a user's work history and computes their earnings per entry using stored rates or detailed bills.
frontend/src/features/work/workAmount.ts: Calculates per‑user and group work amounts using detailed bills or fallback rate‑based computation from local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when changed.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranding.ts: Manages branding settings from storage and listens for update events to sync state.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Implements simple hash‑based routing with state updates on hash change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider to manage Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities and handling login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base setup with extensive OKLCH color variables and custom gradient utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/branding/brandingStorag: Manages branding settings in localStorage, including company/channel names and logo URLs.
frontend/src/lib/storage/companyReportSt: Handles CRUD operations for company report entries stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/safeStorage.ts: Provides safe wrappers for reading and writing values and arrays in localStorage with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/storage/storageSchema.t: Ensures storage schema consistency by clearing legacy keys and setting a version flag.
frontend/src/lib/storage/supportMessagin: Stores and retrieves support message threads per user, appending new messages in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userProfileStor: Manages storing, retrieving, and removing profile photos per user in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/state/session/SessionProvid: Maintains user session state, handles login logic for admin and users, and persists session to localStorage.
Defines TypeScript types for session objects, login results, user profiles, and related entities.
frontend/src/state/session/useSession.ts: Custom hook to access the session context, ensuring it is used inside the provider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins for theming and typography.
project_state.json: Defines the project state and requirements for updating the admin dashboard UI, focusing on larger circular buttons and grouped money-related buttons.
